attributes.action: Change the school week to a four day week
attributes.additional_details: I think that many teachers are overworked and burnt out. Teachers could use Friday to relax, or catch up on work. The Government has launched a taskforce to help reduce the workload of teachers by five hours a week, but we don't see how this will happen, and think reducing the school week to four days is a better option.
attributes.background: Reduce school to 4 days a week. The same amount of school hours should be spread across four days, rather than five. The school week should be Monday to Thursday.
